The dataset includes the following files:
 - "README.Rmd' 
 - "run_analysis.R" - script with code that cleans the dataset
 - "CodeBook.Rmd" - describes the variables, the data, and any transformations or work that have been performed to clean up the data
 - "clean_data.RDS" - dataset after transformation, before grouping or subsetting columns
 - "mean_grouped.RDS" - dataset grouped by activity and subject and mean calculated for every variable
 - "mean_std.RDS" - columns that have mean or std in name included
